splashscreen.text:
# Satellites for Peat's Sake 

Flow Country, Scotland

blocks.description: Compare various satellite imagery and data visualizations of Scotland's Flow Country, showcasing its unique landscapes changes over time.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. This mosaic, acquired on 28 May 2018, offers a rare cloud-free view over the vast expanses of Scotland's Flow Country.
slides.caption: Satellites for peat's sake.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. This high-resolution land cover map derived from Copernicus Sentinel-2 data shows the extent of peatland in purple.
slides.caption: Satellites for peat's sake. 2

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. False colour image including the shortwave infrared channels highlights the active fire front in bright red.
